nodes.text: The Lost Diary of Walter Emanus was a diary that was written by Professor Walter Emanus on his excavation of the Temple of Exar Kun, where he became enslaved to the spirit of Exar Kun. When a team of spacers attacked the Cult of Exar Kun in the temple catacombs, they found the pages of the diary.

The Lost Diary of Walter Emanus featured in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies and was introduced in 2008 as a collection quest within the Exar Kun Heroic Encounter quest. Pages of the diary were dropped by various NPCs with the quest and when all the pages were put together, the player was given the Diary as a reward.
